name: Sandals Montego Bay
description:
Step into the place where it all began—the first-ever Sandals Resort.
Nestled on Jamaica’s largest exclusive white-sand beach.
Just a swift 10-minute drive from Sangster International Airport.
Located near Montego Bay’s lively attractions and nightlife.
Stay at one resort, play at two with full exchange privileges at nearby Sandals Royal Caribbean.
Sip cocktails at Latitudes Overwater Bar or say 'I do' at our Overwater Wedding Chapel.
Twelve unique dining spots and six vibrant bars—your taste buds are in for a treat.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Seven pools and three whirlpools await for your relaxation and fun.
Paddleboards, kayaks, snorkeling, and motorized water sports like waterskiing, windsurfing, tubing, and more—all included.
opened_notes: The first Sandals Resort, originally the Bay Roc Hotel
renovation_notes: Fully renovated after ~4 years of upgrades

name: Sandals Royal Caribbean
description:
​Jamaica’s only resort with its own private offshore island and secluded beach.
​Home to the Caribbean’s first Over-the-Water Bungalows & Villas.
​Just a quick 10-minute drive from Sangster International Airport.
​Close to Montego Bay’s attractions and buzzing nightlife.
​Enjoy British-style afternoon tea daily in our charming Tea Room.
​Nine unique dining experiences and six bars.
​Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
​Eight freshwater pools, a scuba dive pool, and six whirlpools.
​Paddleboarding, kayaking, snorkeling, Hobie Cats, windsurfing, and more.
renovation_notes: Introduced Caribbean's first over-water villas on Dec 1, 2016

name: Sandals Negril
description:
Set on the longest and best stretch of Negril's Seven Mile Beach.
Offers some of the most picture-perfect sunsets in the Caribbean.
Every room is just steps away from the beach.
Powdery white sand and turquoise waters.
Easy access to deep-sea fishing.
Eight unique dining experiences and six bars.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa
Three freshwater pools, one scuba dive pool, and three whirlpools.
Paddleboards, kayaks, Aqua Trikes and motorized sports like waterskiing, windsurfing, wakeboarding, tubing, and more

name: Sandals Ochi
description:
An expansive resort set on over 100 acres.
Access to Jamaica's most popular golf course, Upton Estate Golf and Country Club — green fees and transfers included.
Home to Sandals' first speakeasy bar, the Rabbit Hole.
Sixteen unique dining experiences and eleven bars.
Fitness center and two Red Lane® Spas with a solarium.
Seven freshwater pools, one scuba dive pool, 98 villa pools, and 22 whirlpools.
Close to the world-famous Dunn's River Falls and Martha Brae bamboo river rafting.

name: Sandals Royal Plantation
description:
An all-butler, all-oceanview suites boutique resort offering authentic Jamaican charm.
Features two private cove beaches with beach service.
Access to Jamaica's most popular golf course, Upton Estate Golf and Country Club–green fees and transfers included.
Offers full exchange privileges at Sandals Ochi and Sandals Dunn's River.
Home to Jamaica's only champagne and caviar bar.
24-hour in-suite dining always available.
Five unique dining experiences and three bars.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Two freshwater pools and one whirlpool.
Close to the world-famous Dunn's River Falls and Martha Brae bamboo river rafting.
opened_notes: Opened by 1989–1991 as second Ocho Rios resort

name: Sandals South Coast
description:
Protected by rolling hills and 500 acres of nature preserve.
Set on a two-mile stretch of Jamaica's white-sand beach.
Over-the-water collection includes bungalows, Serenity Wedding Chapel, and Latitudes Overwater Bar.
Rondoval Village features the Caribbean's longest swim-up pool.
Beachside food trucks like Chicken Dippers and the Taco Truck.
Tennis and pickleball courts with nearby attractions like Pelican Bar and YS Falls.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Four beachfront freshwater pools, including Jamaica's largest zero-entry pool.
Nine unique dining experiences and seven bars.
Paddleboarding, kayaking, snorkeling, Hobie Cats, windsurfing, and more.
opened_notes: Re-launched Dec 13, 2023 (formerly Sandals Whitehouse European Village & Spa)
renovation_notes: Complete re-launch essentially served as major renovation

name: Sandals Dunns River
description:
Sandals' newest property in Jamaica, located in the heart of Ocho Rios.
Minutes away from Jamaica's iconic Dunn's River Falls.
Offers full exchange privileges at all nearby Sandals Resorts.
A quick 10-minute drive from Ian Fleming International Airport.
Access to Jamaica's most popular golf course, Upton Estate Golf and Country Club–green fees and transfers included.
Features Caribbean culinary concepts like Blum Coffee Shop and Dunn's Rum Club.
Twelve unique dining experiences and nine bars.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Five freshwater pools and two whirlpools
opened_notes: Officially opened May 19, 2023 - newest resort in the family

name: Sandals Royal Bahamian
description:
A beachfront resort with a private offshore island, Sandals Barefoot Cay, offering two more beaches ideal for relaxing and snorkeling.
Just a quick 15-minute drive from Lynden Pindling International Airport.
Easy access to duty-free shopping, tours, and casinos in downtown Nassau.
All-new Coconut Grove lounge area with food trucks, a bar, and nightly entertainment.
Offers Island Inclusive, an off-site dining program to experience local restaurants.
Twelve unique dining experiences, including two food trucks, and eight bars.
Fitness center and three Red Lane® Spa locations.
Seven freshwater pools and three whirlpools.
renovation_notes: Completely renovated and re-opened in January 2022

name: Sandals Grenada
description:
Located on Pink Gin Beach in the exotic 'Spice Isle.'
Only a 5-minute drive from Maurice Bishop International Airport.
A volcanic island featuring exotic black-sand beaches.
Close proximity to Grenada’s tours, nature attractions, and vibrant nightlife.
Features world-class scuba diving and an underwater sculpture park.
Local ingredients like nutmeg and chocolate are infused throughout the resort’s menus and spa treatments.
Ten unique dining experiences and six bars.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Five freshwater pools, one scuba dive pool, and two whirlpools.
Easy access to deep-sea fishing adventures.

name: Sandals Royal Barbados
description:
Award-winning accommodations like SkyPool Suites, Swim-Up Suites, and Millionaire Suites.
Every suite includes a private Tranquility Soaking Tub™ for two.
\"Stay at One, Play at Two\" full exchange privileges with Sandals Barbados.
Home to the largest infinity pool in the Eastern Caribbean.
Sandals' first rooftop pool, restaurant, and bar overlooking the ocean.
Global Beer Bar and four-lane bowling alley at Lover's Lanes.
Ten unique dining experiences and six bars.
Fitness center and a 15,000 sq ft Red Lane® Spa.
Eight freshwater pools, one scuba dive pool, and four whirlpools.
PADI-certified scuba diving and equipment, with 27 dive sites.

name: Sandals Halcyon Beach
description:
A tropical paradise along pristine white-sand beaches.
French-Caribbean style buildings no taller than two stories.
The most laid-back Sandals resort in Saint Lucia.
\"Stay at One, Play at Three\" full exchange privileges with other Sandals resorts on the island.
Home to Saint Lucia's longest swim-up pool.
Complimentary green fees and access to Cap Estate Golf & Country Club.
Seven unique dining experiences, including one truck, and seven bars.
Stunning over-the-water restaurant, Kelly's Dockside.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Two freshwater pools, one saltwater pool, and three whirlpools.

name: Sandals Regency La Toc
renovation_notes: New Rondoval Butler Villas available starting March 1, 2025 - part of expansion/upgrade

name: Sandals Grande St Lucian
opened_notes: Opened in the 1990s in Saint Lucia

name: Sandals Royal Curacao
description:
Set on 44 oceanfront acres within a protected 3,000-acre Santa Barbara Estate.
​Located alongside the protected Underwater Marine Park with over 70 dive sites.
​Enjoy Willemstad and its cultural attractions, and natural and historic sites.
​Features Sandals' first two-level Dos Awa Infinity Pool overlooking the ocean.
​Access to an 18-hole Pete Dye Golf Course at a discounted rate.
​Offers Island Inclusive, an off-site dining program to experience local restaurants.
​Three freshwater pools, one natural water pool, and two whirlpools.
​Eleven unique dining experiences, including food trucks, and thirteen bars.
​Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
renovation_notes: Massive $55M renovation when converting existing property in 2022

name: Sandals Grande Antigua
description:
Consistently voted the \"World's Most Romantic Resort.\"
​Located on Dickenson Bay, Antigua's famous white-sand beach.
​A quick 15-minute drive from V.C. Bird International Airport.
​Close to tours, shopping, and Antigua's capital, St. John's.
​Home to the original Rondoval Suites.
​Features the largest pool in the Eastern Caribbean.
​Eleven unique dining experiences and seven bars.
​Six freshwater pools and six whirlpools.
​Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.

name: Sandals Saint Vincent
description:
An exotic, undiscovered destination nestled between two seas at the edge of the Lesser Antilles.
Suites tucked away on a private cove.
Home to a collection of 32 islands filled with natural wonders, including waterfalls, rainforests, volcanic peaks, and sandy shores.
Features Sandals' first two-story overwater villas.
Food and beverage concepts inspired by the local cuisine.
Innovative suites featuring media rooms and fitness rooms with equipment.
Over 45 black-sand and coral garden scuba dive sites to explore.
Eleven unique dining experiences and nine bars.
Fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Four freshwater pools, one scuba dive pool, and two whirlpools.

name: Beaches Negril
description:
Located on the best and widest stretch of Negril’s Seven Mile Beach. 
Expansive three- and four-bedroom butler suites for the whole family.
Home to Pirates Island Waterpark with eight waterslides and several toddler pools.
Sesame Street® themed activities with daily character appearances.
Kids Camp & Nursery with certified nannies (INA and IBCCES certified).
The Caribbean’s first certified Autism Centers.
State-of-the-art fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
PADI-certified scuba diving and equipment.
Thirteen unique dining experiences and five bars.
opened_notes: Opened after Beaches brand founding in 1997

name: Beaches Turks and Caicos
description:
Situated on world-renowned Grace Bay Beach — 12 miles of powdery white sand and turquoise waters.
Just a quick 15-minute drive from Providenciales International Airport.
Expansive three- and four-bedroom butler suites for the whole family.
Home to Pirates Island Waterpark, featuring a surf simulator, eight waterslides, and a kids-only swim-up bar.
Twenty-two unique dining experiences and fourteen bars, from casual stops to elevated dinners.
Sesame Street® themed activities with daily character appearances.
Ranked one of the top ten best scuba diving destinations in the world.
State-of-the-art fitness center and Red Lane® Spa.
Ten pools, four whirlpools, and one scuba diving pool.
Professional instruction for water sports, including Hobie Cats, paddleboarding, and kayaking.
opened_notes: Opened in early 2000s in Turks and Caicos
